sentences.translation: He stepped forward to lead the team.

sentences.simplifiedText: 在这 formidable challange正面挑战之际，我们需要一个有经验的人来率领我们面向未来。
sentences.traditionalText: 在這 formidable challange正面挑戰之際，我們需要一個有經驗的人來率領我們面向未來。
sentences.pinyin: Zài zhè formidable challange zhèngmiàn tiǎozhàn zhī jì, wǒmen xūyào yīgè yǒu jīngyàn de rén lái shuàilǐng wǒmen miànxiàng wèilái.
sentences.translation: In the face of this formidable challenge, we need an experienced person to lead us into the future.

sentences.pinyin: tā shuàilǐng tuánduì zǒu xiàng chénggōng.
sentences.translation: He led the team to success.

sentences.simplifiedText: 作为项目经理，他成功地率领团队完成了这个复杂的任务。
sentences.traditionalText: 作為項目經理，他成功地率領團隊完成了這個複雜的任務。
sentences.pinyin: zuòwéi xiàngmù jīnglǐ, tā chénggōng de shuàilǐng tuánduì wánchéng le zhège fùzá de rènwu.
sentences.translation: As a project manager, he successfully led the team to accomplish this complex task.
